description: This is an amazing and well located apartment. The place is huge and super clean. Located on 61 btw 3 and lex. All major transportation from your door steps 4,5,6,F,N,R dry cleaners underneath the building, Starbucks across the street, bloomdales  a block away. Real dinning table to accommodate 4. King size bed in the bedroom. Very very secure area.
name: Your home away from home
